citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:09 PM on 08-
AUG-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and left a voice message. A facility
representative was soon able to return the inspectors' call, whereby the report and availability were discussed. Failure to
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure
to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:09 PM on 08-
AUG-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone and left a voice message. A facility 
representative was soon able to return the inspectors' call, whereby the report and availability were discussed. Failure to 
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure 
to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
